issue.title: UnionListWriter is not implementing all methods on interface ScalarWriter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ScalarWriter` interface extends several scalar writers such as `IntWriter`. Each of these scalar writers have two methods.
 \* write<Type>(javaPrimitiveType)
 \* write(<Type>Holder)

Currently UnionListWriter only implements the first method and not the second.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1101?focusedCommentId=16041942) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
Issue resolved by pull request 740
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/740>
